name: WrathOfNature
description:
Have a look around inside of our game.

Wrath of Nature is simple tower defense game developed by slain wolves dev team.

Survival endless game play that is challenging and tactics are essential to survive.

All the characters can be upgraded in two ways.
Earn the coins by cleaning the waves and buy your favourite companion. =

Share your score among your friends and flex it on any social media.

Facebook Page : https://www.facebook.com/Wrath-of-Nature-100699795691538

We made a discord channel for all of challengers to have fun in a one place.
Feel free to join.

Discord : SlainWolves (https://discord.gg/t2PPd5B8)
